guest_info.name: Kiki Palmer
guest_info.title: Real Estate Agent
guest_info.specialty: Transitioning from dual career to full-time real estate

main_topics: Transitioning from dual career to full-time real estate
Building and managing a real estate database

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Limited lead sources primarily from SOI and referrals
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Expand lead sources by leveraging virtual assistants for cold calling and developing drip campaigns.
Segment database into categories like buyers, sellers, and set up automated drip campaigns.
Aim for 90% adherence to scheduled activities to avoid lost business opportunities.

target_avatars.relevance: Kiki is transitioning from part-time to full-time, a common challenge for intermediates.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Focus on diversifying lead sources and improving database management for growth.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: I have a net worth goal, which is very different than an income goal.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of focusing on net worth rather than just income.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Are you setting the right financial goals in real estate?

key_tactics.tactic: Use a virtual assistant for cold calling
key_tactics.context: To handle tasks you dislike and expand lead generation efforts.

key_tactics.tactic: Implement a 'red light, green light' budget strategy
key_tactics.context: Test new lead sources for three months and stop if no ROI is seen.

quotable_insights: Become your client's dream maker by understanding and fulfilling their dreams.

resources_mentioned.name: Ninja Selling
resources_mentioned.context: Recommended for personal growth and improving sales skills.

resources_mentioned.name: Real Geeks
resources_mentioned.context: For agent websites and CRM to improve lead conversion.

episode_summary: In this episode, Kiki Palmer shares her journey from a dual career to full-time real estate, highlighting the importance of diversifying lead sources and improving database management. Coach Brent Scott provides actionable insights on enhancing productivity and client care, offering strategies to help agents transition smoothly and grow their business effectively.
